member.name: T:Neptuo.Collections.Specialized.ProviderKeyValueCollection
member.summary: Extensible . When reading value, which has not been set yet, calls registered provider. Providers are of the two groups (distinguished by registration): a) for specific key (registered with key). b) general (for all keys). When trying to get value which key is not present, first gets called provider registered with specific key, than those registered without key.
